summary: Implements the logic for creating exchange files that split a MODFLOW 6 groundwater model into multiple sub‑models for parallel execution. The module prepares geometric boundaries, renders visual representations of the partitions, and configures generation options, and it is automatically invoked when a simulation is divided.
business_intent: Facilitate high‑performance, distributed groundwater simulations by automating the creation of inter‑submodel exchange structures, reducing manual setup effort and ensuring consistent partitioning across parallel runs.
